drove from DC to NJ today, took about 5-6 hours in heavy stop/go traffic. Long lines at Starbucks at rest stop - what recession?

what what to my wonderig eyes did appear but an agent - a mic, and a boarding call so clear! gnight folks, go ez on plum pudding
